Body:
nonzero_pole_indices, shape_functions = an.shape_functions(degree=2, order=
    2, knots=[1, 1, 3, 3], weights=[2, 2, 2], t=2)
assert_array_almost_equal(nonzero_pole_indices, [0, 1, 2])
assert_array_almost_equal(shape_functions, [[0.25, 0.5, 0.25], [-0.5, 0.0, 
    0.5], [0.5, -1.0, 0.5]])
staticmethod
